resources.string: Code not valid or username already taken
Are you sure you want to delete the proposal?
The passwords must be the same
Introduce the new coment for the proposal \"%1$s\"
Look at the proposal I found in Àgora!
Please select a position in your neighbourhood!
Are you sure you want to delete the comment \"%1$s\"?
Make the relevant changes in the comment
The new password must be different

Ágora is an application dedicated to improving your neighborhood, make proposals, vote them and you can make a better neighborhood. Our system offers many features, on this screen you can check the functionalities for each screen that you will find in the side menu:

In the tabs at the top of the screen, you can find a help guide for each of the screens, identified by its icon. In addition all the apilcation offers a multi-language system, by clicking on the flag at the top of each screen you can select the language you want, among the available ones (Catalan, Spanish and English)
The main page, where you can see all the proposals made in your neighborhood, offers the following features

"Through the drop-down you can select 3 types of filtering:
 
1.All: All proposals appear
 
2.Category: when selecting this option, another dropdown appears with the available categories
 
3.User: when selecting this option, an editable field appears where you can enter the desired username"
On each card, the following actions can be taken:
Through the like or dislike buttons we can vote the proposal, in the case that the proposal has been made by you, these buttons will appear disabled
Mark a proposal as a favorite

Using the heart-shaped button on the top of the card, you can mark a proposal as a favorite to be able to consult it later, in the case that the proposal was created by you, this option is not available
See the details of the proposal

By clicking on the SEE MORE button, you will be redirected to a screen where the user can consult better the information of the proposal. There is the possibility of looking to added images and location, if the proposal has these annexes. In case of being a proposal not created by the user, he may vote and make it a favorite, otherwise, the proposal may be edited or deleted. Also from this screen, you can comment on the different proposals, and in the case that the comment you have made, you can edit or delete
See the profile from creator user

By clicking on the create button located at the bottom of the screen, you are redirected to the creation screen where you define the name, description and category of the proposal, additionally, by pressing the bottom button of the screen, the option to add images or location to it.

By selecting the name of the creator of the proposal you can check the profile of this:
 
If you click on your username, you will be redirected to my profile screen.
 
If you select another user, you can consult their information and click on the button to see the proposals, you can check the proposals of this.
" The page of my proposals, where you can see the proposals made by you, offers the following features within each card "

Clicking on the three points button, an options menu appears with two options:
 
Edit: When you click this option you will be redirected to a screen where you can edit the title, the description and the category of the proposal, as well as add or delete images or location
 
Delete: When selecting this option, a message appears asking if you are sure, if so, the proposal is deleted.
See the details of the proposal

By clicking on the SEE MORE button, you will be redirected to a screen where the user can better consult the information of the proposal. There is the possibility of looking at added images and location, if the proposal has these annexes. Since the proposal is created by the user, it can be edited or deleted. Also from this screen, you can comment on the different proposals, in the case that the comment you have made, you can edit or delete
The page of my favorites, where you can see the proposals marked as favorites, offers the following features within each card (quite similar to the main page)
Through the like or dislike buttons we can vote on the proposal
Using the heart-shaped button on the top of the card, you can mark a proposal as a favorite to be able to consult it later

By clicking on the SEE MORE button, you will be redirected to a screen where the user can better consult the information of the proposal. There is the possibility of looking at added images and location, if the proposal has these annexes. Being proposals not created by the user, you can vote and mark the proposal as a favorite. Also from this screen, you can comment on the different proposals, in the case that the comment you have made, you can edit or delete

When selecting the name of the creator of the proposal you can check the profile of this, once in the information screen you can check your information and clicking on the button to see the proposals, you can check their proposals.
My profile page, where you can check your profile, offers the following features:
Through the Edit button, you are redirected to a screen where you can complete your profile data, change the image or change the password.
The achievements page, where you can check achievements, offers the following features:

In this screen the user can see the achievements that he has achieved previously and also the achievements that he has pending to achieve, when clicking on the achievement the user receives a small description about the achievement and, in the case of some specific achievements, receives a discount to use in neighborhood stores that have an agreement with Agora.

" Agora has a system of achievements that, when performing certain actions, provides an achievement to the user. Some of the actions that can provide an achievement would be to comment on a proposal or create a new proposal."

Agora has a system of notifications to communicate to the user when it has received an achievement, the system will send a notification of the push type so that the user can see in the status bar of his phone the achievement he has received, by clicking on this notification will redirect the user to the achievements screen, to observe the change in the list of achievements.
